verbs.description: [ARG1: at least 56 inmates] [V: killed] [ARGM-LOC: in prison riot] [ARGM-LOC: in northern brazil] several victims beheaded at least 56 inmates died during a prison riot in the northern brazil state of amazonas including several who were beheaded or dismembered brazil são paulo economic crisis judge luis carlos valois primeiro comando da capital amazonas rio de janeiro anisio jobim penitentiary complex jose vicente da silva prison
